keyword: how many calories in teaspoon of peanut butter
title: How Many Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in teaspoon of peanut butter, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter?
assumptions: Smooth, natural peanut butter (no added sugar or salt); 1 teaspoon â‰ˆ5 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (natural vs. processed), added ingredients, and measurement accuracy. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of peanut butter contains about 30 kcal and 1.3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a teaspoon of natural peanut butter?
faqs.a: About 30 kcal for natural, unsweetened peanut butter.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one teaspoon of peanut butter?
Does peanut butter have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 2.5 g total fat per teaspoon, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: How does sodium vary in peanut butter?
faqs.a: Natural unsalted is low (~20 mg); salted brands can reach 50-100 mg per teaspoon.

faqs.q: Is a teaspoon of peanut butter keto-friendly?
faqs.a: Yes, low carbs (1 g) make it suitable, but check for added sugars in brands.
